website_summaries.verdict: A no-frills, high-quality weight bench that can handle serious weight.
pros: Uses 11-gauge steel tubing to handle up to 1,000 pounds
Padding along the top of the bench is made from breathable, durable material that adds extra cushioning and comfort
Vinyl finish makes it easy to clean
cons: A simple bench that doesn't come with any added accessories

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy !
customer_reviews.text: Package came in a timely manner , box was slightly damaged but contents were fine ! Very easy to assemble , took about 15 minutes . Was pleasantly surprised with the weight of this bench and demensions were correct as given in advertisement . I bought strictly for use on flat bench as I found my adjustable bench to be just a tad wobbly and sought more support when lifting heavier weights . This bench so far appears to be one of the few bargains that actually has a quality build . Pleased !
customer_reviews.author: James Turner

customer_reviews.title: Really solid bench.  My weight + weights = 400 lbs, and this is rock solid.  No regrets, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Really solid bench. My weight + weights = 400 lbs, and this is rock solid - it is listed at 1,000lbs and I believe it. No regrets, would definitely buy again. This bench pad is 12" wide. I'm 6' tall and this bench is as narrow as I would want to go for my size. I mention this because many of the other benches on Amazon are narrower... several on Amazon are only 10" wide. Unless you are fairly thin across the shoulders, I don't think you want to go narrower than this 12" model. Assembly was easy and everything went together well. I am very happy with this purchase, just what I wanted for my home weightlifting and exercise.
customer_reviews.author: blu-ray!!!

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stable and just the right amount of cushion
customer_reviews.text: Love it, been wanting one for years and I finally pulled the trigger on this one and boy was a glad I did, the cushion is stiff but giving, I am 6 foot and I can actually lay on this for my crunches, it is very stable and very easy to assemble. It also comes with 2 tools to make assemble a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Stable, sturdy good size.....
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time..... very well packaged. Instructions were clear, parts were well packaged, and we were able to put it together quickly with the included tool and an additional pair of pliers. It would have gone a little faster with a socket wrench but did not have the socket size required. The bench is very well constructed..... no rough edges or mismatched parts or pieces. The padding is firm and well constructed the cover has a nice feel and is not slippery. I looked at several benches at local fitness stores that started at $100 higher and this compares favorably. Length and width, as well as construction make it sturdy and stable. We are anticipating many years of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: A.W. BELL

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bench, some assembly required
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid bench. I bolted everything together, sat it where I wanted it to be, put some 45's on it and cranked everything down. No wobble. It you just bolt it together upside down, you could jack it up I guess, but my way worked like a charm. They even included little wrench things to help. A 3/4" wrench and vicegrips worked nicely for me. The bench is super steady under me, not to heavy to move. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Von Holt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench. No odd odors, very sturdy. I use mine for weight work and some vigorous ab work hanging onto one side or the other with no movement of the bench. This brand is priced competitively with other brands, however a lot of the other brands do not match the level of quality that Rep puts into their equipment. I was also looking for new weights so I chose the Rep brand and was not disappointed with those either. The bench has clear assembly instructions, all the parts are included, packaged well, priced right, excellent quality, what more could you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Built like a Tank
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a solid straight weight bench, look no further.. You have found it. While it may be a little pricier than some of the others it is quality built. If you notice, a lot of the other weight Benches have a max load capacity of 300 lbs, which makes them unpratical for anyone that is large. This beast has a load capacity of a 1000 lbs, so unless your parking your vehicle. On it, there is nothing to worry about. It is simple to put together (socket set recommended) and looks great.... Ah, for a weight bench. If you are looking for a great weight bench, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Inform

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bench for powerlifting
customer_reviews.text: I lift in a power rack so I needed a bench that was not only sturdy with a firm pad, but one with similar dimensions as the benches from powerlifting meets. This fit the bill and the price was right so I pulled the trigger. So far I have been using this bench for close to a year and it has been the best bench I have ever purchased. I have since sold the other benches I had and have never looked back. I highly recommend this bench if you perform bench presses in a power rack. It is firm enough to get into a tight position and bench correctly for powerlifting purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Lift heavy things with confidence!
customer_reviews.text: Our household decided to start Stronglifts 5x5 and needed a solid bench that could handle how incredibly swole we're going to get. So far the heaviest weight this thing has seen is a little over 220lbs between human and barbell with plates combined, but I'm fairly confident it is not going to collapse and kill any of us at higher amounts. Assembly was quick and easy, and adjusting it to be level on our floor was a simple process of lightly unscrewing the bolts, getting it sturdy, and then retightening them. A great bench at a great price -- definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this bench again
customer_reviews.text: This bench came in a huge box. It comes with all the tools you need to build it but having a socket wrench makes things so much easier. The instructions are easy to follow and I had no pieces left over. This bench is awesome and sturdy. I am 5ft 8in 180lbs and very comfortable on this bench. The bench does not slip and feels firm when laid on. Simple and not that heavy to lug around.
customer_reviews.author: Domo

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid bench.  Be sure to read instructions if bench isn't stable
customer_reviews.text: Bench is very solid. Make sure to follow the instructions. I had a nasty wobble in mine after I built it. I looked closer at the instructions and it clearly says to NOT tighten the bolts until you've placed it the bench where you want to use it. The proper order seems to be to tighten the soft part to soft top to the base. Then tighten the soft-part/Base to the uprights. Lastly, tighten the two parts that sit flush to the floor. Doing it in that order resulted in my bench being rock stable. It definitely feels like something you'd expect to find in a professional gym.
customer_reviews.author: JaSoN

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Flat Weight Bench
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband. He wanted a simple, flat weight bench. It was delivered promptly. The bench was easy to assemble. It is stable and sturdy. The dimensions are perfect. The pad is comfortable. The price was reasonable. We are very happy with this purchase and highly recommend this weight bench. One of the reasons we chose this weight bench is because of the complete product detail available. For example, my husband wanted to know the maximum weight rating and exact pad dimensions. Surprisingly this information was not available for flat benches from some other major brands. We will not hesitate to purchase other products from Rep Fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie J Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not made in America as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The bench arrived today and was easy enough to assemble and appears to be a sturdy bench. The two negatives 1) I bought this because I believed it was made in America - however, it was designed here and made in China, 2) as is typical with any product from China, one of the bolts I received was not correct for the bench so I need to buy a bolt at Home Depot to complete the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Wurtz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to assemble, easy to use and a great price. One drawback: Unless you are particularly long legged or flat bottomed, it will be hard to get into a full, flat footed bench position on this bench. It must be taller than the standard issue bench in commercial gyms, as I cannot comfortably get my heels on the ground when benching, and I'm 5' 10 1/2" and 245# with a 32" inseam. So unless you are skinny and/or leggy and/or tall, you may need a shorter bench. I nonetheless give it a 5 because it is so solid and well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F.

customer_reviews.title: A Strong Stable Bench for Weightlifting
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent flat bench. I can’t believe I put up with my original bench for as long as I did. This bench is extremely well built, easy to assemble, and safe to use. No flex or rocking at all. It arrived without flaws or damage. Update: After 2-1/2 years of use I decided to upgrade to a Rep Fitness Fat Pad. Fits perfectly but the height is now 19 inches (IPF specifies 17.5" max but I don't compete) so there's that.. The extra width supports the shoulders better and the additional height is more comfortable for my giant-sized self.
customer_reviews.author: o1d_dude

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a solid bench that I could lift a lot of weight on. The bench is not as solid as I hoped for. it says it has a plywood base layer, but if it does, the plywood does not go from end to end. The ends of the bench bend up and down like there is no support there. The bench is level and seems to work decent for me so far, but I would not have bought it if I had known about the ends of it. I feel like if I sit down with heavy dumbbells too close to the end it will break.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Comfort

customer_reviews.title: I needed a workout bench that was sturdy enough for my 270lb husband to use but the ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt sure what to expect but was pleasantly surprised, this exceeded my expectations! I needed a workout bench that was sturdy enough for my 270lb husband to use but the ones in the store felt cheap and were too expensive. This is not only sturdy but it is easy to maneuver and lift, I'm only 5'2 but can move it easily. Would definitely recommend for a quality workout bench.
customer_reviews.author: Jennee McMullen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bench for an even more excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Although the product arrived with slight cosmetic damage, it is built like a tank and rivals it's more expensive competitors. I don't think you'll find a bench in this price range that is as well built, solid and rated to this weight capacity; feel totally comfortable using it for what it's meant to do
customer_reviews.author: kealoha, q.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Dont't understand the bad reviews. We have used ours for a month before giving this review. Extremely easy to put together, less than 15 minutes. Very solid and heavy. I have no doubt it can support the weight advertised. Both myself and my wife are shorter people with my wife being 4ft 11. Competition bench sits lower to the ground and she can get more thrust and push off with the leg stability. In her words, the best bench she ever used. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: tammy stillion

customer_reviews.title: the only thing i really do not like is leveling it
customer_reviews.text: the only thing i really do not like is leveling it. i level it for one place, then it wobbles in another place. i've never had this problem with any other bench i've had. this could be due to it's heavy construction, thus making it not give any when moved within the same area. well built, and holds up well to loads. i am comfortable about lifting with a heavier load.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at an Amazing Price!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is an absolute breeze to put together and the pieces are a nice thick gauge. All the pieces were perfectly coated and the bench top is a great dense material. I did a quick chest workout and the bench was as sturdy as promised. The bench has no wiggle or creeks or squeaks. Although I've only had one workout on this bench I am extremely happy with the price and quality of this bench. Great product by Rep Fitness!
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Girl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bench
customer_reviews.text: awesome bench, absolutely what I needed. It is lower in height then most but that is what makes it perfect. When you lay on the bench to do your bench press, your feet are comfortably flat on the floor and the bend of your knees is perfect for me. Very comfortable when lifting heavy weight. Quality of the bench is excellent, heavy steel frame.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: This is a good one
customer_reviews.text: I like this bench. Its easy to assemble. It took under ten minutes-but I have my own wrenches. You don't need your own tools, but It will take more with the ones they supply. Either way. Its a good solid bench and serves my workout purposes, and will yours too, if what you need is a solid flat bench. I think its a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: SJPizMBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: The bench arrived yesterday in a box that could survive a fall from an airplane. I have purchased may items from Amazon and this bench had the best shipping box hands down. The bench is heavy duty and assembly was easy. I am glad I purchased this bench instead of one of the cheaper models. You will not be disappointed with this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Bob U

customer_reviews.title: Good simple bench, but watch the corners...
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the pictures, there is no metal cross support at either ends of the bench. Performing an exercise similar to what's pictured (dumbell row) with your hand in any of the four corners of this bench will be met with an audible crack as the board gives way to weight where there is no support. Not a problem if you're 100lbs lifting 10lb weights.
customer_reviews.author: Sendou

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!  Well packaged! Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Impressive! Heavy duty, well packaged. I was looking for a cheap bench for home use for days I didn’t make it to the gym. When it arrived every piece was wrapped and tapped with foam to protect the paint. The quality of the bench is the same if not better then the benches found at my local world gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In a world of cheap Chinese crap especially on a amazon
customer_reviews.text: Feels very well made for the price. In a world of cheap Chinese crap especially on a amazon, this is a good piece of equipment. This is probably a good deal stronger than it needs to be, as it is a thicker gauge of steel than all of the incline benches I saw (really, what's up with that?). I'm happy with the apparent toughness of the faux leather padding. It's also pretty firm.
customer_reviews.author: Xenophon's loser brother

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bench at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting/needing a basic bench in my home gym for some time, never had the funds. I found this one at a very reasonable price and decided to give it a whirl. This bench is great! Assembly was easy and it is super sturdy. I am impressed with the quality of the whole piece, the cushion is perfect; I was afraid the cushion would be minimal, too soft and have a cheesy covering, this does not. And delivery? Very fast, received it within 3 business days!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen D. LaFrance

customer_reviews.title: Great bench, solid, sturdy and feels very safe
customer_reviews.text: Bomb proof weight bench. I wanted something sturdy for bench pressing on. This thing is built like a tank. Very sturdy and solid, no wiggle to it at all. Light enough to move around but they used very heavy gauge steal. Great overall bench
customer_reviews.author: Dan R.

customer_reviews.title: Best flat bench I found on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Another one of my purchased to be used for my mobile training business. Since clients come in all shapes and sizes I searched far and wide for a high quality bench that is built strong enough for all types of clients to use. This one not only fits that requirement but is built solid. No wobble or anything! I use this confidently knowing my clients will be safe while exercising! 10/10 recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua G

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the quality of the bench, goes together with minimal tools and looks like it can take a beating. The pad is firm, but comfortable unlike cheaper squishy benches. This bench is a good value, and should be seriously considered for home or commercial use.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy. If you don not understand how to assemble ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy. If you don not understand how to assemble this bench, go onto their website and they had a video you can watch. It was very helpful. You will need a few tools. Luckily I had them. It is recommended that you assemble the bench where you will be working out. I did and then bench is evenly balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: and I can say this was a perfect buy! There aren't many benches this wide and ...
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before I bought this bench, and I can say this was a perfect buy! There aren't many benches this wide and it is perfectly dimensioned. The pad is very firm, feels very high quality. The covering also seems rugged, and was fitted to the pad flawlessly. Assembly was super easy. All the bolts and nuts fit perfectly, nothing was stripped, every thing went together with no issues! You can tell this is not a cheap bench from China, it is VERY well made. Very stable while working out, it will easily handle any weight I used. I highly recommend this bench!
customer_reviews.author: Brad and Sue

customer_reviews.title: USA made and it shows!
customer_reviews.text: USA made and it shows. I assembled this bench today, I laid on it and I have been missing out. I had my wife lay on it and she agreed. We are both into weight lifting and exercise and this bench is stable, tough, rigid but not uncomfortable like the chinese made plywood benches and perfect for everyday use. Im very happy with this purchase and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good price, Good bench
customer_reviews.text: Stiff, sticky, durable. These are all good qualities in a bench. You don't want to be moving around or sliding when you pull your scapula into the bench. Its not so stiff, that you feel like you benching on plywood, but you can tell its not a Thompson Fat Pad. To prevent wobble, follow the instructions that come in the box. Put everything together loosely, set it where you want it to be, and THEN tighten everything down.
customer_reviews.author: TheCleansingTide

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy, Great price, Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough good about this bench. Easy enough assembly, Extremely sturdy as soon as it was together. It is comfortable but not too soft where your body shifts. The fabric is soft but has enough utility where it seems it will hold together for a long time. Have not had any issues with it so far. Grips on the bottom so it does not slide on my platform. This is a great product and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DBN

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench, Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty picky with my bench, I use this while I lift 45-60 dumb bells. The bench is solid, easy to put together and feels of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sensible_Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd bought this first
customer_reviews.text: This is the bench I should've bought before trying a cheaper product from a big box store, which was thrown away as useless. This bench is wonderful. I'm 6' and it is a great fit. My adult 6' 2" broad shouldered son loves it also. Solidly built, the padding is comfortable enough without compressing to nothing, the width is perfect for dumbbell work and the length is more than adequate. The bench height is perfect for us guys. A smaller person (woman) might find this to be a little outsized for them. My adult 5' 7" daughter did some butterflys and says she thinks it'd feel better to her if it were 1" narrower.
customer_reviews.author: Senior Suguaro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This bench is SOLID. It’s really well made. I know some reviews are mixed, but the bench I received is outstanding for the price. The red and black look great with my TDS power rack, too.
customer_reviews.author: Abe Froman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing addition to any home gym
customer_reviews.text: Just got your Rep 1000 lb Rated Flat Weight Bench delivered and our son had it put together in no time. He knocked out a set for feel. He absolutely loves it and cannot wait for tomorrow's bench session! Very sturdy and just the right height for a great coil! Thank you for an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and comfortable af
customer_reviews.text: Strong, sturdy, and comfortable af. If you're certain you don't want a bench with an adjustable angle then this is your item. However, I do recommend getting one with an adjustable angle -- I didn't and I regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Labenz

customer_reviews.title: A definite recommend to any home-gym lifter . . .
customer_reviews.text: Best bench I've ever owned, and I've owned many in my 20+ years of lifting. I wish I would've bought it sooner, and this is a definite recommend to any home-gym lifter looking for a secure, heavy-duty bench. Works great in and out of my power rack. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Olm W.

customer_reviews.title: was packaged to prevent damage during shipment and was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Rep Fitness flat weight bench for my home gym. It arrived on time, was packaged to prevent damage during shipment and was easy to put together. I've been an avid gym rat for over 20 years and this bench is constructed of equal quality (and perhaps in some cases even better) than the benches I have used at the gyms. It will definitely serve my purposes and I would highly recommend to someone looking to buy an all-purpose flat bench that can withstand multiple exercises and use with both light and heavy weights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, 11ga steal, 1000 lb capacity
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality bench with actual 11 ga steal. Rep products are amazing. I live close to Rogue in Columbus so my savings on shipping can make it more appealing than others but I shop around for the best deals and the rep bench was the best I could find shipped with my budget.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and rock solid
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this bench for a few months now and I've got no complaints whatsoever. Easy assembly and rock solid. It does tend to wobble a little if I'm not on it, but once I'm laying down or sitting on it, the wobble seems to go away. If you're looking for a bench, I'd absolutely recommend this one. Most others in this price range have a max weight around 300 lbs and aren't very specific if that means user plus weight or just weight. Seriously, this is a gym quality bench and you'll have the peace of mind that it won't break on you when you're under a bar.
customer_reviews.author: Demogorgoth

customer_reviews.title: Very solid bench!
customer_reviews.text: Just got the bench a few days ago. Easy to assemble and feels very solid. The padding is thick and firm. I weigh 200 and my max bench is around 265, so I have no worries about exceeding the limits of this bench. This was more than I originally wanted to spend on a bench, but The reviews of other benches with crumbling particle board and failing welds definitely concerned me. I shouldn't have to worry about any of that with this beast!
customer_reviews.author: justcuz

customer_reviews.title: Clearly sold a defective product
customer_reviews.text: I had a good feeling I was sold a return when I saw the box. The supports were rusted and the bags were covered in it. The center part of the horizontal piece that the pad goes into is very obviously incorrectly shaped and welded. There was plenty of iron sand in the box. On top of all that, the quality control checklist states it's all good, send it on through! Yes, I could have dealt with two missing bolts and cleaned up the rust, but I paid $130 expecting a new product that I wouls keep for many years, and this doesn't cut it.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is the one you probably want. It bolts together easily enough, and feels really solid. Not the thin gauge steel used by lower-priced competitors. Having just put together another company's barbell stand, I notice this had better manufacturing tolerances -- the screws lined up with the holes, and the parts fit together correctly. You might be able to get it cheaper from the company; I used Amazon for prime shipping, only for the USPS to miss the Prime target by a day.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Great for the first few months....
customer_reviews.text: This was fine for a few months, but here we are... 7 months later and the staples are falling out all over the place. Honestly, I'm not sure the cover will make it another 7 months. Kind of regret not buying a Rogue bench at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: This bench is a tank. Everything fits perfectly together with a minimal amount of work and it’s as solid as a rock. No wobbling at all. Money well spent. Would recommend a socket wrench and a spanner for assembly, as the included tools aren’t the best, however, it’s awesome that they sent some.
customer_reviews.author: Greg, MD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, really stable bench, but have two wrenches.
customer_reviews.text: The bench, once completely set up is very stable, very good height, comfortable, and doesn't have any unnecessary bells and whistles. Useful for doing my workout and folding my laundry, too! Putting it together was easy enough, but it took me some time to realize I needed a 2nd wrench to be able to tighten some of the screws. They provide some cheap utility wrenches if you're in a pinch, but I wouldn't recommend using them.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Barbatsis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, reliable, simple at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, comfortable and well worth the price. Easy to assemble. Size is perfect for me (5'10" guy and my 6'2" roommate) Only issue was the packing had a ton of tiny metal beads loose in the box it shipped in, I still find them stuck to my feet time to time. Would absolutely recommend to anyone looking to add a bench to their home gym.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: best bench I have used in a long time!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench!! Well worth the money. I am 6'4" 275lbs so when I was looking for a bench I couldn't find anything that came close to the 1,000lb bench that I needed to do my daily workouts. This bench is very firm but very comfortable and long enough for my tall frame! Don't waste your time messing with the cheap junk out there! Spend a little more get an amazing product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cazer

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid bench. No wobbling at all.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews. If I decide to, it's because a product surpassed my expectations. This is one of those rare instances. This bench is rock solid compared to other benches I've tried. It's also got some length to it which is nice because I'm 6'6" My head and butt fit on the bench at the same time. I can see this bench lasting many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bench and very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bench and very well made. I set up the bench today and it was pretty easy to put together (I didn’t use the tool that came with the bench, I used my own tools, box wrench and sockets). One important thing is to not fully tighten all the bolts until you have the bench in place where you’ll be using it. Another suggestion is put the bench in place and then put some weight on it. I put a 45LB weight plate at each end of the bench and then tighten up the bolts. I used the bench for some heavy bench presses once assembled and it’s fantastic. Highly recommend this bench!
customer_reviews.author: JamesH

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I went with this bench
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I went with this bench, it is very solid with a nice firm cushion. I had a small issue with the item I received I contacted Rep Fitness and they were happy to resolve the issue. It's just the right height, and when I say solid I mean solid.
customer_reviews.author: Art By Clint

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench. The size is perfect, it feels sturdy, and the cushioning is just the density and softness. My only complaint with it is the tools which came with it for putting it together. They look like tiny Klingon bat'leths and were about as effective. The bench was easy to get together after I got some real tools out of our toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Best bench for serious lifting !
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bench because it looks sturdy...and it IS. NO particle board or shaky joints. Made the way power equipment used to be made. I was so impressed, I bought another one a week later !! Can't beat the price either ! Just wish they would include a small bottle of the paint, it does get nicked around a bit during shipping because it's HEAVY !!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Shinko

customer_reviews.title: QA needs some work
customer_reviews.text: Some QA issues like the massive amount of iron sand, random sized washer, and bolt not cut correctly even tho it says it passed the QA. If you hear sand or small grains when you get to the vertical bars, shake them. Mines had lots of iron sand inside. The rubber feet were kinda hard to "slide on". Had to stretch them and then hammer d them in. One bolt was hard to tighten. It only went 1/4 without tools then had to struggle to get the last 3/4 while the other 3 went easily.
customer_reviews.author: Gaming Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bench
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint would be that the bench tries to wobble a bit if the rubber boots aren't on completely tight, and every time I move it the boots tend to loosen a bit. No big deal, I can kick em back on snug. Other than that, I don't think you can beat this bench for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Iroquois

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal... NFL weight room quality here.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a heavy duty, super strong, pro-level flat bench - look no further, this is it. NFL weight room quality here folks... No BS, just buy it. Easy assembly. Excellent value, should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: M.R. Indy

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bench. I’m happy with it. Quality feels nice and it’s sturdy. I’d buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Fatty fiberglass

customer_reviews.title: Great bench, but not the easiest assembly
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid bench, loses 1 star because the tools given to assemble are a pain, really hard to use the two stamped metal tools to tighten the nuts the last few turns. One of the base platforms has a little bit of wiggle (which they probably would have replaced, but I just added a shim).
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BENCH!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was looking for! Solid 11 gauge frame with a nice firm pad. High quality, sturdy, stable. It feels very firm, comfortable and safe It was pretty easy to assemble Dimensions are perfect Hands down this is the best Bench I've ever had and I highly recommend it. It's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: D. Caballero

customer_reviews.title: This bench is solid like a rock
customer_reviews.text: I just got the bench today. It was not leveled so I thought it was the design. It was Sunday so I can't call support. I went to home depot and got a leveler. As it turned out, my floor was not even. With the help of leveler tool and adjusting the bolts near the base, it's perfectly flat. This bench is solid like a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Warped metal. Check your bench level.
customer_reviews.text: Updating my review after a year and thinking that I had a pectoral/delt imbalance. Turns out that the bench was warped. I used some scrap metal to balance it out. It's ok, but still has a slight tilt.
customer_reviews.author: beachbound

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my home gym
customer_reviews.text: A great weight bench for the price. Solid construction, and easy to put together--it took me like 5-10 minutes with a standard socket wrench. It's perfect for bent-over dumbell rows and bench press.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Bird

customer_reviews.title: Top quality, love rep.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Super stabile, I’ve done step ups and bench presses, jumped onto it, pushups on it, squats, etc. it’s super steady, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Good bench except for 1 minor detail
customer_reviews.text: It is as expected except that I needed to put a shim under the ends of the pad otherwise it had a little give to it which felt weird. Absolutely worth the money though.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice bench. Assembly was easy enough. I thought the quality was nice for the price. I was glad that I didn't purchase one of the cheaper ones on Amazon looking back.
customer_reviews.author: russ

customer_reviews.title: IPF standards, powerfully built
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to rogue and others. Use for powerlifting. It meets IPF standards for bench press and feels extremely solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Overall the bench is sturdy, easy to put together, and for the price you won't find much better. When it arrived it was missing one of the legs. But, once I contacted Rep Fitness's customer service they sent me the missing part over night with no charge (shout out to their customer support team!)
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Solid and stable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy bench. Easy to put together, if you use a socket wrench and not the little tools provided.
customer_reviews.author: TXBD

customer_reviews.title: The padding is comfortable, but not overly soft
customer_reviews.text: It's a flat bench. The padding is comfortable, but not overly soft. The metal parts seem sturdy and feel heavy for their size, which is good. It was easy to assemble, and included a multi-function tool. All in all, I feel confident that this bench will work exactly as it is advertised to work. No frills, no fluff; just function. Thumbs way up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Professional Quality Gym Eqiupment at a value price!
customer_reviews.text: From a design standpoint the flat bench is about as simple as gym equipment gets. However, in my experience most company's miss the mark by skimping on materials or structural elements in order to cut costs. This bench may cost a bit more than it's competitors, but it hit's every mark with excellence. The frame is nicely powdercoated steel and assembles easily. The bench uses a strong plywood plank versus flimsy particle board as on other units. I have no doubt about it's 1000lb capacity and rest easy knowing that I'll not have to look for another flat bench in my lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: rich park

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think you’ll beat this price for such a sturdy bench. Does what it needs to. Upholstery is good, quick assembly, doesn’t wobble at all.
customer_reviews.author: Seller_CM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect flat bench solution at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Much like the PR 1050 I ordered from Rep, this came packaged very nicely and assembled easily, and as a bonus it arrived in 2 days. Instructions were far better this time. Bench feels solid and comfortable. Im a larger fella, 6 foot 230, and it accomodates my frame very well. Had well over 500 total on it, i dont see this failing with any weight i can ever hope to put on it.
customer_reviews.author: Giles Cates

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bench. Users who state it is unstable must of assembled it incorrectly or assembled on an unlevel surface. When I bought it it was $130. I would of gladly paid more for this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Tightening the 4 bolts on the feet last will help adapt to a slightly uneven floor!
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. The only thing that I didn’t recall seeing in the ad was the simple and complete assembly instructions and hardware( including wrenches). I am very satisfied with the workbench.
customer_reviews.author: gnowlan01

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bench
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, heavy, looks like it will stand up to years of use and abuse.
customer_reviews.author: tukatz

customer_reviews.title: Rep Delivers on Flat Bench
customer_reviews.text: Got a warehouse deal and got such a solid bench to start my Corona gym. Went premium with thr rack by Rogue and Texas Power Bar and this bench hangs right there with them. Definitely will be checking out more Rep products. The 5000 version is often reviewed as best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Used for about a dozen workouts so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Used for about a dozen workouts so far. This is a good solid product, padding is good and solid but comfortable and supportive. Bench is the right height for my wife and myself to be able to put feet flat on the floor when doing bench press, and is a good height for dumbbell work.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a serious weight lifter and he loves this bench. The blue is real cool looking and it's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: maria shekels

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to assemble. Extremely stable and comfortable. No longer afraid of using heavier weights and having my old bench wobble. I'm just over 6' tall and the length is of the bench is great.
customer_reviews.author: breukelen_718

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a sturdy bench that was able to hold both my weight and the weight I am lifting. The Rep Fitness bench is rated for 1000 lbs. and fit my budget. It's the perfect height, very comfortable, and is no doubt sturdy. I couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: S.Oger

customer_reviews.title: Rep Fitness Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Rep Fitness has some great weightlifting/workout equipment, and for a better price compared to the bigger names in fitness equipment. I continue to find myself going back to Rep Fitness, even after surfing the internet for deals.
customer_reviews.author: Truthseeker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for what you are getting, I got the bigger once first but it was way too heavy this one is just right and it is made like a tank
customer_reviews.author: Sergey Kasimov

customer_reviews.title: Love this but I wish they would have packed it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this but I wish they would have packed it differently, or specified where to cut because I sliced into the seat!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: and it's holding up great. Its just at comfortable as the competition bench ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bench a couple months, and it's holding up great. Its just at comfortable as the competition bench they have at the gym I go to. The height and thickness are both comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Looking for an inexpensive bench for our home gym. Checked many reviews before settling on this one. It was easy to assemble and very sturdy. So glad we didn't buy one of the cheaper ones. This bench is exactly as advertised. Great product and appropriately priced.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Heavy duty bench
customer_reviews.text: Very Sturdy Heavy duty bench. Easy to assemble. Check the measurements because it is a large bench people! Highly recommended for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little bench.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and very solid. Really happy with this little bench.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is built like a tank! Yet comfortable the cushon has the right amount of studrines and softness! It is hands down the only flat bench you will ever need!!!! Beautifully crafted quality all around!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bench
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3 stars because once assembled it didn't sit flat. It has a little rocking motion.
customer_reviews.author: tom hugenberger

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bench to replace an incline bench that broke (while in the flat position). So far both my husband and son love it. It is very stable, as well as comfortable. Looking forward to many more workouts with it!
customer_reviews.author: ActiveMom

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: This bench is heavy duty and a great option for the price. I use it for bench press and as a substitute for a squat box for my wife. I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and the Rogue flat bench and I couldn’t be happier with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was choosing between this and the Rogue flat bench and I couldn’t be happier with this product. I’m sure the Rogue bench is a great product, but I can’t ask for any more than what this provides. It’s solid, comfortable, and secure.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy bench, fairly easy to assemble, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bench and fairly easy to assemble, once I figured out how to hold a moving part steady when tightening a screw. Instructions were not as informative as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Hedonic

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: The build quality of this bench is insane for the price point. Packaging was spot on and powder coated metal was protected. Instructions were spot on. Highly exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Conduzzi

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: A very good value! Incredibly sturdy, easy to follow assembly instructions. Firm, but comfortable padding, good grip. I don't think I will ever need to buy another flat bench, it is that sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Mendacious Frog

product_meta.title: REP FITNESS Flat Bench - FB-3000-1,000 lb Rated Bench for Weightlifting
feature_bullets: STRONG AND STABLE: Our heavy-duty 1,000 lb ASTM rated flat weight bench is essential equipment for any home or light commercial gym. Designed for use with dumbbells, smith machines, cages or power racks.

PERFECT SUPPORT FOR LIFTING: The pad measures 12 inches wide, and the stable 16 inch base makes it ideal for back support and leg drive during bench press. It’s comfortable to sit on but durable and sturdy under load. The top surface of the pad is 17.5 in from the floor.

QUALITY MATERIALS: Our flat bench is constructed from 11 gauge steel with a thick plywood base layer (NOT particle board like our competition), dense foam core, and soft top layer for the perfect mix of support and comfort where you need it. The 2.5 inch thick pad is covered with durable, textured non-slip vinyl and professionally stitched.

EASY TO CLEAN AND STORE: At 45 lbs, you can easily move it around your gym or store it out of the way when not in use. The pad is covered in ultra-tough, durable vinyl that wipes clean quickly and easily. Dimensions: 47x12x17.5 inches

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Order today and get a 10 year warranty on the frame, 30 day warranty on the pad. Rep Fitness is a full-service equipment company based in Denver, Colorado. We carry a complete line of strength and conditioning equipment including benches, barbells, dumbbells, racks, cardio equipment and more!
